can someone help! Used trial version of winrar to unpack all *.rar files. End up with two files Armada 2.bin and Armada 2.cue. I can't do anything else. Please explain what I am doing wrong
the cue file is a type of CD image...use an emulator program like Alcohol 120 to run the image like a CD...google cue, iso or Alochol 120 for more info

also, forgot to mention that the bin file is simply a binary file that is used to transmit data across the Internet, for example a peer to peer network like the one used for Kazza, Azureus and BitTorrent, you only need to worry about the cue file
